page.title: 10A Day In My Life
page.content: I wake up and go into the bathroom and wash my face and clean my teeth. I go back into my bedroom and get dressed. I get on my shoes and go downstairs. I have my breakfast, then I have my hair brushed.I get on the bus and go to school. We go in and have assembly. In the classroom we have Maths for an hour.Then we have play, then we do English.We have dinner a while later. We all have a long dinner play. When we go in we do our topic groups until last play,when we do our unfinished work.After a while we go on the bus home. When I get home I get changed,watch television, have tea and get into bed.
